entity.name: Prince Adewumi Adewale
entity.description: A digital strategist and developer creating intelligent, scalable solutions that merge technology and marketing. My work, including Harmony Marketing Hub, is built on a foundation of FOSS principles.

projects.name: Harmony Marketing Hub
projects.description: An AI-powered FOSS platform for marketing automation, data-driven campaigns, and customer engagement. It is built extensively on a FOSS stack.

channels.description: Support the Harmony Marketing Hub project through Open Collective, a transparent platform for FOSS funding.

plans.name: API Subscriptions Fund
plans.description: Covers monthly costs for third-party API subscriptions and services essential for the platform's core functionality.

plans.name: Infrastructure Development Grant
plans.description: A one-time grant to support scaling the platform's cloud infrastructure and optimizing its AI models for broader use cases.
